title: Theta correspondence via group C*-algebras
authors: Magnus Goffeng, Bram Mesland, Mehmet Haluk Sengun
abstract:
We prove that the well-known explicit construction of the local theta
correspondence by Li has a simple interpretation in terms of group C*-algebras.
In particular, we deduce that in two standard cases where Li's method work,
local theta correspondence arises from a continuous functor. Moreover, using
results from a companion paper, we treat global theta correspondence using
C*-algebraic methods. As a byproduct, we exhibit that Rallis inner product
formula can be interpreted as a certain natural inclusion being an isometry.
